alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 12:25AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL PINE AND NORTHEASTERN BURNETT COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM CDT... At 1224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, or 20 miles east of Hinckley, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Webb Lake Wisconsin, Danbury, Cloverton, Mille Lacs Band Lena Lake Area, Oakland, Markville, Saint Croix State Park, Riverside, and Yellow Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
